name: One Simple Test
description:
Welcome to my submission for the Mix and Game Jam 2020: One Simple Test!

This is my first ever game jam! I've enjoyed every step of the process and can't wait to do another!

To go with the theme of "Mixing Genres", I've decided to combine puzzle mechanics with 2D platforming mechanics and make a Puzzle Platformer.

Feel free to leave feedback for improvements or even new mechanics. 

Enjoy playing!

Controls:

A D or Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

E - Interact

F - Pickup Box

Q - Throw Box

Links:
